heading: HB00108
0: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR STRICTER REGULATION IN THE PACKAGING, USE, SALE, DISTRIBUTION AND ADVERTISEMENT OF TOBACCO PRODUCTS, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9211, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE ꞌTOBACCO REGULATION ACT OF 2003ꞌ
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2019-07-23
